page.content: in Worcester city ,which is then transferred to him through a personal radio which he carries around with him ,and when he is in his car he gets them through a VHF radio. To be a good Village Policeman he believes that the qualities a man needs is patience, tolerance, understanding and the ability to listen patiently to the many problems that people bring to him. Above all a sense of humour is required. He gets one week-end off each month and he likes to spend his time in the garden, watching television and reading. As often as possible he likes to get away from the village and take his family with him to visit relatives and friends. This gives him a break which is so important.
